general.name: mos_target_sdssv_plateholes
general.description: The combination of the dr19_sdssv_plateholes and dr19_sdssv_plateholes_meta tables are a database representation of the SDSS-V platelist data product (https://svn.sdss.org/public/data/sdss/platelist/trunk/). These tables were used within early iterations of FPS target_selection as a way to communicate information about which targets had been included in SDSS-V plates. This information was used to e.g. de-prioritise targets that were expected to have a good quality spectroscopic measurement by the end of the SDSS-V plate observations. The dr19_sdssv_plateholes_meta table contains meta-data for each SDSS-V plate (one record per plate), whereas the dr19_sdssv_plateholes table has one entry for each drilled hole in each SDSS-V plate. The dr19_sdssv_plateholes and dr19_sdssv_plateholes_meta tables should be joined via the yanny_uid field.  Mostly derived from: https://data.sdss.org/datamodel/files/PLATELIST_DIR/designs/DESIGNID6XX/DESIGNID6/plateDesign.html

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

holetype.name: holetype
holetype.description: type of hole to be drilled; one of SDSS, BOSS, MARVELS, APOGEE, GUIDE, CENTER, TRAP, or ALIGNMENT; this really refers to the instrument to be used, so for example SEGUE targets should be either SDSS or BOSS

targettype.name: targettype
targettype.description: type of target; one of SCIENCE, STANDARD, or SKY (if holetype is BOSS, SDSS, MARVELS or APOGEE); NA if not holetype is not one of the instruments (GUIDE, CENTER, TRAP, ALIGNMENT)

sourcetype.name: sourcetype
sourcetype.description: indicate the nature of the source, one of STAR, QSO, GALAXY, or NA (if targettype is NA)

iplateinput.name: iplateinput
iplateinput.description: integer indicating which plateInput file from the list in the plateDefinition file this came from (1-indexed); -1 or 0 if the hole wasn't from a plateInput file.

pointing.name: pointing
pointing.description: which pointing (1-indexed) this target is associated with; note this means which pointing among the ones that this plate is designed for, so if this a single pointing plate but uses the B-side MARVELS fibers, this will be "1", not "2"

offset_integer.name: offset_integer
offset_integer.description: which offset this target is associated with; 0 means it is not associated with an offset, it is associated with the primary pointing

fiberid.name: fiberid
fiberid.description: what fiber on the appropriate instrument (as listed in holetype) is assigned to this target (-9999 for none)

block.name: block
block.description: which fiber block that fiber is associated with (-9999 for none)

iguide.name: iguide
iguide.description: for guide holes, which guide fiber it is assigned to (from 1 to 11) (-9999 for non guide holes)

xf_default.name: xf_default
xf_default.description: X position of hole in focal plane, given a default set of observing parameters (hour angle of zero, temperature of 5 deg C), in units of mm; for position angle of zero (which we always use), +X is +RA

yf_default.name: yf_default
yf_default.description: Y position of hole in focal plane, given a default set of observing parameters (hour angle of zero, temperature of 5 deg C), in units of mm; for position angle of zero (which we always use), +Y is +Dec

lambda_eff.name: lambda_eff
lambda_eff.description: wavelength to optimize hole location for, in Angstroms (platedesign will default to 5400 if not set)

zoffset.name: zoffset
zoffset.description: backstopping offset distance, in microns (platedesign will default to 0 if not set)

bluefiber.name: bluefiber
bluefiber.description: 1 if the BOSS instrument is meant to assign this target a "blue" fiber; 0 otherwise

chunk.name: chunk
chunk.description: BOSS chunk number (0 if not appropriate)

ifinal.name: ifinal
ifinal.description: 0-indexed position in BOSS final tiling file (-1 if not appropriate)

origfile.name: origfile
origfile.description: for BOSS targets, name of file that target originated within (for BOSS targets, one of the bosstarget files, for ancillary targets, a file within the directory.

fileindx.name: fileindx
fileindx.description: for BOSS targets, 0-indexed position within ORIGFILE (-1 if not appropriate)

diameter.name: diameter
diameter.description: diameter of hole to be drilled, in mm

buffer.name: buffer
buffer.description: buffer to leave around hole edge for conflicts in mm

priority.name: priority
priority.description: priority number assigned by the plateInput file; lower numbers indicate higher priority

assigned.name: assigned
assigned.description: 1 if this was a target assigned to a fiber, 0 otherwise; clearly for all targets this will be 1 for plateDesign files, but this will not be the case for plateInput-output files, which also have this same format.

conflicted.name: conflicted
conflicted.description: 1 if this was a target not assigned because of a collision, 0 otherwise; clearly for all targets this will be 0 for plateDesign files, but this will not be the case for plateInput-output files, which also have this same format.

ranout.name: ranout
ranout.description: 1 if this was a target not assigned because we ran out of fibers, 0 otherwise; clearly for all targets this will be 0 for plateDesign files, but this will not be the case for plateInput-output files, which also have this same format.

outside.name: outside
outside.description: 1 if this was a target not assigned because it was too fare from the plate center, 0 otherwise; clearly for all targets this will be 0 for plateDesign files, but this will not be the case for plateInput-output files, which also have this same format.

ifudesign.name: ifudesign
ifudesign.description: intended IFU identified for this object

ifudesignsize.name: ifudesignsize
ifudesignsize.description: number of fibers in intended IFU identified for this object

bundle_size.name: bundle_size
bundle_size.description: obsolete; used for number of fibers in bundle for MaNGA prototype cartridge, December 2012

fiber_size.name: fiber_size
fiber_size.description: obsolete; used for fiber size (in arcsec) for MaNGA prototype cartridge, December 2012

tmass_j.name: tmass_j
tmass_j.description: 2MASS Point Source Catalog J-band magnitude; Vega-relative; not Galactic extinction corrected; if available

tmass_h.name: tmass_h
tmass_h.description: 2MASS Point Source Catalog H-band magnitude; Vega-relative; not Galactic extinction corrected, if available

tmass_k.name: tmass_k
tmass_k.description: 2MASS Point Source Catalog K-band magnitude; Vega-relative; not Galactic extinction corrected, if available

gsc_vmag.name: gsc_vmag
gsc_vmag.description: V mag from GSC if available

tyc_bmag.name: tyc_bmag
tyc_bmag.description: B mag from Tycho2 if available

tyc_vmag.name: tyc_vmag
tyc_vmag.description: V mag from Tycho2 if available

mfd_mag_u.name: mfd_mag_u
mfd_mag_u.description: MARVELS magnitudes for stars in the PRE_SELECTION plates; VT, BT, V, J, H, K

mfd_mag_g.name: mfd_mag_g
mfd_mag_g.description: MARVELS magnitudes for stars in the PRE_SELECTION plates; VT, BT, V, J, H, K

mfd_mag_r.name: mfd_mag_r
mfd_mag_r.description: MARVELS magnitudes for stars in the PRE_SELECTION plates; VT, BT, V, J, H, K

mfd_mag_i.name: mfd_mag_i
mfd_mag_i.description: MARVELS magnitudes for stars in the PRE_SELECTION plates; VT, BT, V, J, H, K

mfd_mag_z.name: mfd_mag_z
mfd_mag_z.description: MARVELS magnitudes for stars in the PRE_SELECTION plates; VT, BT, V, J, H, K

sp_param_source.name: sp_param_source
sp_param_source.description: source for stellar parameters for MARVELS stars

marvels_target1.name: marvels_target1
marvels_target1.description: bitmask for MARVELS targeting flags (see the MARVELS target flag descriptions.

marvels_target2.name: marvels_target2
marvels_target2.description: bitmask for MARVELS targeting flags (see the MARVELS target flag descriptions.

boss_target1.name: boss_target1
boss_target1.description: bitmask for BOSS targeting flags (see the BOSS target flag descriptions.

boss_target2.name: boss_target2
boss_target2.description: Always set to zero (placeholder for BOSS target flags never used).

ancillary_target1.name: ancillary_target1
ancillary_target1.description: bitmask for BOSS ancillary targeting flags (see the BOSS target flag descriptions.

ancillary_target2.name: ancillary_target2
ancillary_target2.description: bitmask for BOSS ancillary targeting flags (see the BOSS target flag descriptions.

segue2_target1.name: segue2_target1
segue2_target1.description: bitmask for SEGUE-2 targeting flags (see the SEGUE-2 target flag descriptions.

segue2_target2.name: segue2_target2
segue2_target2.description: bitmask for SEGUE-2 targeting flags (see the SEGUE-2 target flag descriptions.

segueb_target1.name: segueb_target1
segueb_target1.description: bitmask for SEGUE-bright targeting flags (see the SEGUE-bright target flag descriptions.

segueb_target2.name: segueb_target2
segueb_target2.description: bitmask for SEGUE-bright targeting flags (see the SEGUE-bright target flag descriptions.

apogee_target1.name: apogee_target1
apogee_target1.description: bitmask for APOGEE targeting flags (see the APOGEE target flag descriptions.

apogee_target2.name: apogee_target2
apogee_target2.description: bitmask for APOGEE targeting flags (see the APOGEE target flag descriptions.

manga_target1.name: manga_target1
manga_target1.description: bitmask for MaNGA targeting flags. Used for galaxy targets.

manga_target2.name: manga_target2
manga_target2.description: bitmask for MaNGA targeting flags. Used for stars and sky positions.

manga_target3.name: manga_target3
manga_target3.description: bitmask for MaNGA targeting flags. Used for ancillary targets.

apogee2_target1.name: apogee2_target1
apogee2_target1.description: bitmask for APOGEE2 targeting flags (see the APOGEE2 target flag descriptions.

apogee2_target2.name: apogee2_target2
apogee2_target2.description: bitmask for APOGEE2 targeting flags (see the APOGEE2 target flag descriptions.

apogee2_target3.name: apogee2_target3
apogee2_target3.description: bitmask for APOGEE2 targeting flags (see the APOGEE2 target flag descriptions.

mag_u.name: mag_u
mag_u.description: magnitude to use for the SOS software as the best known fiber magnitude for the object

mag_g.name: mag_g
mag_g.description: magnitude to use for the SOS software as the best known fiber magnitude for the object

mag_r.name: mag_r
mag_r.description: magnitude to use for the SOS software as the best known fiber magnitude for the object

mag_i.name: mag_i
mag_i.description: magnitude to use for the SOS software as the best known fiber magnitude for the object

mag_z.name: mag_z
mag_z.description: magnitude to use for the SOS software as the best known fiber magnitude for the object

epoch.name: epoch
epoch.description: epoch for which RA and DEC are most appropriate in years AD (default 2011)

pmra.name: pmra
pmra.description: proper motion in RA direction in milliarcsec/yr

pmdec.name: pmdec
pmdec.description: proper motion in Dec direction in milliarcsec/yr

targetids.name: targetids
targetids.description: free-form, white-space separated list of identifiers

catalogid.name: catalogid
catalogid.description: SDSS-V catalogid associated with this target

sdssv_apogee_target0.name: sdssv_apogee_target0
sdssv_apogee_target0.description: bitmask for SDSS-V plate-era APOGEE targeting

sdssv_boss_target0.name: sdssv_boss_target0
sdssv_boss_target0.description: bitmask for SDSS-V plate-era BOSS targeting

firstcarton.name: firstcarton
firstcarton.description: name of the SDSS-V carton which was the primary reason this target was assigned a fiber

xfocal.name: xfocal
xfocal.description: final X position in the focal plane of the hole, in mm; for position angle of zero (which we always use), +X is +RA

yfocal.name: yfocal
yfocal.description: final Y position in the focal plane of the hole, in mm; for position angle of zero (which we always use), +Y is +Dec

yanny_uid.name: yanny_uid
yanny_uid.description: internal integer identifier for the platelist file from which this inforation was extracted

yanny_filename.name: yanny_filename
yanny_filename.description: filename from which this information was extracted

pkey.name: pkey
pkey.description: primary key for this table entry
